Question: A patient has symptoms which includes Wheezing and shortness of breath, what is/are possible disease for such symptoms. Also give possible treatments.A patient has Fever. What disease it may have?
Answer:
1->"Disease": Asthma || "Symptoms": Wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness || "Possible Treatments": Inhalers, bronchodilators, corticosteroids

2->"Disease": COVID-19 || "Symptoms": Fever, cough, loss of taste/smell, difficulty breathing || "Possible Treatments": Supportive care, antiviral meds, vaccines

3->"Disease": Influenza (Flu) || "Symptoms": Fever, chills, sore throat, runny nose, body aches || "Possible Treatments": Rest, fluids, antiviral medications

4->"Disease": Pneumonia || "Symptoms": Fever, cough, difficulty breathing, chest pain || "Possible Treatments": Antibiotics (bacterial), supportive care

5->"Disease": Lupus || "Symptoms": Joint pain, fatigue, skin rashes, fever || "Possible Treatments": Anti-inflammatory drugs, immune suppressants
